title: Galaxie Copernicus
content:
Check out [Galaxie Copernicus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003453/http:/vllg.com/Village/GalaxieCopernicus/mudTyper+Weights/) by Chester Jenkins and Kris Sowersby. Just printed the PDF specimen and....WOW! Solid workhorse. Look how tasty those italics are, you could have them for dessert.

What say you?

Rahim

-----------------

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GalaxieCopernicus4_5555.png)
author: RahimSnow
